div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 252 Cnossus, Crete, before 1955 Burial: mid 2nd cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 35 AR. Hoard? From excavations Sicyon: 10 triob. Argos: 10 triob. Achaean League: 7 triob. Rhodes: 8 dr. Disposition: Herakleion Le Rider, Monn. cr√©t., pp. 222-3
